author: Matthew Farrell
comment: Great and simple little app, tunes my double bass perfectly. The only annoying thing is that you can't change it to the concert pitch of 415htz. As a baroque player, and a Viola da Gamba player, it would be nice to be able to tune at A415

author: Rea Chatt
comment: I play the tuba, and I have a Samsung S5 which has a pretty good microphone, but even with my tuba blaring a C, it first says it's an F, which sounds TOTALLY different than a C, than it says it's a D, then finally a C. Takes so much time to finally tune, and it's meant for every instrement, get your priorities straight people!
title: Back and forth and back again

author: Yarley H
comment: Tried to tune my B-flat clarinet but it often can't catch the notes. Unless there's no background noise. But I can tune with other tuning apps.
title: Tuning "sensitivity" is kinda too low

author: Natalia B
comment: It would be great if it actually picked up your notes. I try to tune during class and it picks up nothing. I hate it though. Get a better tuner,  just some advice.

author: David Gill
comment: Slow to identify notes, full screen ads. And worst of all, shaky on a reference tone compared to other tuners tested. Beautiful UI, but needs work. Tested on Nexus 6P.

reply.author: Fretello
reply.content: Hi David, thanks for the note. Can you please tell us which instrument you are playing and what phone you are using?

title: Pretty, about it

author: Christopher Good
comment: Great because the pay version lets  you shift master tuning along the Hz spectrum for the A note enabling 432, 444 Hz tuning and etc which is how all music should be!

author: Alexis Chavez
comment: I play a C and says im playing E then to G ???? Or when i play a B then it goes to C :/
title: Bad tune

author: Gerard Taylor
comment: Before accessing this app, you must consent to recording, after which the screen overlay of your device must be disabled. This is inferior engineering.
title: Complete turn-off!

author: Johan Kohler
comment: The app responds too slowly to be of any use. Several seconds lag in frequency changes.
title: Very slow response

author: Esteban Franco
comment: It's super laggy for Android. Tunning is ok but it takes like a minute to get to the right note

author: Ruben Fernandes
comment: Falls short on accuracy :(
title: Not accurate.

author: Divan Sassenberg
comment: D, no A.. No ...F...maybe? This tuner is tone deaf.. Bite the bullet, buy a real tuner

reply.author: Fretello
reply.content: Hi Divan, tuning with your phone heavily depends on the quality of your phone's microphone, but also on the instrument your are trying to tune. Please let us know which phone you are using and which instrument you play so we can improve the detection process for your device.

title: Bad tuner

author: Kristine Simmons
comment: It's good, may have some ads, and takes a little time to get the note you're playing, but other than that, it's ok!!!

author: Lucy Shen
comment: Took forever to find the right note after I've played it.  Also doesn't show me the sharps.

author: Porter Donahue
comment: slow and almost every note was wrong

author: Aleksandar Mlazev
comment: Nice ui - bad tuner

reply.author: Fretello
reply.content:
Hi Aleksandar,
can you please provide us with more details or more specific feedback and write us an email? We're constantly improving the app to support more and more instruments. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

author: Alex Davis
comment: It help me out with the trombone boi
title: Boi

author: PureCurse
comment: it doesnt wotk. it doesnt show my tuning

author: Kris Hadyn
comment: Very helpful.
title: Did what it was supposed to

comment: I use this for band class
I like it because  of the  way it  help me play the flute

author: Eldad Saforo
comment: It does what it saids

author: Victor Low
comment: Works perfectly for my instrument

author: Frejie Beringuela
comment: Thank you for this love it.

author: golden bunny
comment: Its good 👌🐰

author: Ashis Panday
comment: Simple, clean and just what you want.
title: A neat little tuner

author: nvm1773
comment: I dont use it too often, but for what i need it its perfect. Keep up the good work!
title: Pretty good

author: Matthias Roiss
comment: Handles everything down to the low B perfectly,  however at Bb or at a drop A it starts to get unprecise,  but that is more fault of the phone than of this app.
title: Bass Tuner

comment: Very practical! We all have our phones with us anyway, why carry a tuner around when you have this solution!  Perfect for street musicians.🎶
title: Stream-line your music gear!

author: Florian Lettner
comment: Best tuner for Android! Works for all my guitars. More precise than my 50 bug Korg tuner.

author: Michael Schöllhammer
comment: it's the simplest yet most accurate tuner app in play store!
title: love it

author: Thomas Osl
comment: Sweet tuner! Clean, precise and fast in it's operation. Love it.

author: Lukas Götz
comment: Easy to use and precise. I can really recommend it.
title: Excellent!

author: Chris G
comment: very nice features! keep it up like that :)
title: love it

author: Bettina Steger
comment: super UI :)

author: Tasha Mustacha
comment: I'm using a Nvidia shield tablet. I've tried tuning my violin, viola and mandolin. For the E string on the violin it was okay, and the A string on violin and viola the same, but for any lower notes it didn't work, and it didn't work at all for the mandolin! The G strings on all instruments are picked up as D.
title: Not very accurate.

author: Connor Hay
comment: Full screen ads a major distraction. Has trouble identifying medium volume notes, even without background noise. It looks very nice and would be a delight to use if not for those other issues.
title: Not worth keeping.

author: Wesley Richmond
comment: This thing pops up ads even when you have it minimized. Unacceptable also changing a from 440 and static tune is disabled in free version. Don't download

reply.author: Fretello
reply.content:
Hi Wesley,
we already fixed the ad issue. Changing the concert pitch as well as static tuning is premium feature, so you have to upgrade to unlock them. Upgrading also removes the ads completely from the app.

title: Ad hell

author: Paul Jung
comment: Really happy with the look, would have paid for the full version had it tuned well. The UI is absolutely spot on, but that doesn't count for anything if the app doesn't serve its purpose. (Samsung galaxy s6, guitar. Don't blame the poor functionality on the microphone, other tuning apps such as 'guitar tuna' work fine)

reply.author: Fretello
reply.content:
Hi Paul, 
thanks for your feedback. We'll have a look at this issue on the S6. Please give us some time to investigate this issue.

title: Really wanted to give this app a chance

author: Mal Lover
comment: This is the worst tuning app I have ever gotten.

reply.author: Fretello
reply.content:
Hi Zoe,
please let us know what exactly you do not like. We appreciate any feedback that helps us to improve our app.
